channel.title: Pokemon Go News
channel.description: Sourcing all of the latest Pokemon Go Information

item.title: Raid Bosses changes: March 5th, 2018
item.description: Rayquaza’s recent victory over Groudon and Kyogre brought us more than just weather boosted Egg hatches: double XP and a raid boss shake up!

item.title: Claydol Raid Boss Guide
item.description: In this guide you will learn how to take down this Tier 3 raid boss.

item.title: Charizard Raid Boss Guide
item.description: In this guide, you will learn how to handle Charizard in the Raid Boss scene.

item.title: Exeggutor Raid Boss Guide
item.description: Exeggutor can be easily soloed just like any other Tier 2 Raid boss. But don’t sleep on him. If you’re looking for an easy solo with a great Pokemon, Exeggutor might be your best option.

item.title: Slowbro Raid Boss Guide
item.description: Like all other Tier 2 Raid bosses, Slowbro can be easily soloed and has a wide variety of available counters. The question with Slowbro raid is not whether or not you can do it, but rather should you do it.
